name: draining

making you feel very tired: Reliving painful experiences can be emotionally draining. Operating the heavy machinery is draining work.
More examplesFewer examplesI've never understood why airports are so draining, but they are.I found the stress of the interview day utterly draining.For a patient, going through the insurance process from diagnosis to treatment to follow-up is draining in itself.She did really well to have such a draining day and still be cheerful at the end.The team must have found last Saturday's defeat a draining experience.
